Sequence Information.Peptide Name: A2, Complement component C8 alpha chain (273-288)

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Four novel antimicrobial peptides derived from human C8?-MACPF
Literature.Author: Zhang Z, Zhou Y, Sun J, Mao P, Jing X, Ma X, Ma L
